name: Shapeless (TheSyXan)
description:
Welcome to the world of Shapeless! You are a little dot trying to make it in a big world. (Well, it would be a big world if this were not made for a game jam.)

As a dot, move around the maze to collect dots and become a shape. You need to be in the correct shape before reaching the goal at the bottom.

Controls:

Left/A - Move Left

Right/D - Move Right

Down/S - While a Triangle or Square, unfold into a line.

Up/W - While an unfolded shape (triangle or square), fold back up into that shape.

R - Reset
